entry.title: Signature Logo Cap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Company
Type:
Price: 50.00

A white Signature Logo Cap designed for a snug and comfortable fit. Our six-panel cap features a white embroidered Logo, a pre-curved visor and an adjustable closure.

entry.title: Benjamin Edgar Cap/Keychain
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Company
Type:
Price: 50.00

A modern artifact thoughtfully created in collaboration with Chicago designer Benjamin Edgar Gott and his namesake brand as a way to demonstrate reusability being a form of sustainability. The object was engineered using 6101 aluminum and operates as a cap to our spirit bottle and as a keychain when attached to its wire rings; a nod to the future-forward nature of what we do.

entry.title: Sugar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Company
Type:
Price: 40.00

On our trajectory towards commercialization, we have identified a way to create consumable sugar (glucose) using our patented carbon conversion technology. This carbon-negative sugar can be used for human consumption or as a microbe for biomanufacturing products such as food and plastic. Our sugar creation is supported by NASA as we work together to extend humanity by creating microbes that can be used during space expeditions to Mars. While we have developed sugar for applications beyond earth, we are also actively working to assess viable means to scale its production here on our planet as well.

entry.title: Rocket Fuel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Company
Type:
Price: 40.00

Our proprietary technology has the ability to transform carbon dioxide (CO2), from both the atmosphere on Mars and from the air on earth, into rocket fuel. The atmosphere of Mars is primarily comprised of CO2 (95.32%)—the remainder being N2 (2.5%) and Ar (1.9%)—providing us the perfect opportunity to plant our technology on its surface to propel the ongoing production of fuel. Our team of engineers is continuously innovating our rocket fuel so that we can bring astronauts home from Mars.

entry.title: Methanol
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Company
Type:
Price: 40.00

Alongside the production of our ethanol, we are working to scale methanol production for application across various industries including shipping and automotive. Our carbon-negative methanol has been tested and has been proven to be cleaner than AA-grade methanol. The shipping industry is gradually transitioning to using green methanol as a low-carbon fuel alternative and we’re here to help.

entry.title: Jet Fuel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Company
Type:
Price: 40.00

We’re taking to the air, creating the future of our commercial goods and regenerating the aviation industry. We’re introducing one of the first aviation fuels made from CO2, powering air travel with air itself. Sustainable aviation fuel plays an integral role in reducing the carbon footprint of traditional fuels significantly, and by 2050, all airlines will have to transition to 100% sustainable fuel. We’re emerging as a pioneer in this space, creating a carbon-neutral jet fuel to be distributed across North America. To curb our emissions stemming from transport, we’ll deploy modular sites as close to airports as possible, creating a direct facility-to-airport pipeline.

entry.title: Ethanol
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Company
Type:
Price: 40.00

We have demonstrated and proven our ability to produce ethanol at an industrial scale using our patented carbon conversion technology. Our carbon-negative ethanol has been tested and proven to be unparalleled in quality and purity, and we are working to offer it at a commercial level for greater impact within consumer industries.

entry.title: Benjamin Edgar T-Shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Company
Type:
Price: 40.00

​​A limited-run t-shirt in collaboration with Chicago designer Benjamin Edgar Gott and his namesake brand. Made from 100% organic cotton that was grown without pesticides or herbicides and is Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) certified.

entry.title: Air Vodka with Natural Flavors
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Company
Type:
Price: 50.00

Air Vodka with Natural Flavors is the world’s cleanest, highest quality and most sustainable spirit. It’s also the world’s first carbon-negative spirit. This spirit is engineered to help create a world with cleaner air—the perfect way to balance indulgence with impact. It’s clean and crisp with a smooth finish and is best sipped on the rocks or in a martini, or Airtini as we call it.

entry.title: Air Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Company
Type:
Price: 25.00

Created at the height of the pandemic to help combat a global threat, Air Spray is a fast-drying, 80% ethyl alcohol hand sanitizer made from air. It’s a carbon-negative antibacterial spray that protects against germs while quantifiably improving the air we breathe.

Available for purchase in a trio in the United States, we donate a 3-pack for every 3-pack sold to a climate-centered non-profit organization.

entry.title: Air Eau de Parfum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Company
Type:
Price: 220.00

Air Eau de Parfum is the world’s first fragrance made from air. Inspired by the earth’s most abundant and vital elements of air, water and sun, it’s a genderless and limited-release fragrance.

Air Eau de Parfum is offered with three cap variations; a no-cap, chrome-finish clip for an even lighter environmental footprint, a high-gloss chrome cap and a satin-finish white cap. The clip on the no-cap variation holds the pump in place for travel. 

Notes: 
Top: Orange Peel, Fig Leaf
Heart: Jasmine, Violet, Azalea, Sweetwater
Base: Powdery Musk, Tobacco

Our debut fragrance is now available for pre-order in the United States and will ship in early 2022.

Scroll to see all cap options.
